price: 29. Ezalaki sé bogangi moko (mongongo ewutaki na likolo) mpe etumbu ezuaki bango.
arabic: إِن كَانَتۡ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَإِذَا هُمۡ خَٰمِدُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: in kānat illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan fa-idhā hum khāmidūna
